title: MTNNET
author: MTNNET
content: People who really understands what investment is all about, took time to plan and scale their income weight, Period of plan and period of investment. Bitcoin investors know when and how to invest weather trading or mining there is an appropriate time for it. And as investor you're not expected to hit and run or even eat up your profit. You've to give it time to grow hip hop and accumulate more. That's why in most cases I trust bitcoin investment to any forex or others channels, in bitcoin one hardly loss it all especially if the value of units coins remain safely. How do you know a good investors?* they're futuristic* they're planners* they're financial manager* they're risk managers* they're projectedThat's how to know a good investors of bitcoin who do not see challenges but the possibilities of making their future work.Bitcoin is a good assets to invest on but it's also has it own risk which you must learn.

comments.author: JayPeacock
comments.body: As a fellow Bitcoin investor, I completely agree with your insights. Understanding the true essence of investment requires careful planning and strategizing to maximize returns. Whether it's through trading or mining, knowing the right timing for investment is crucial. It's essential to avoid impulsive decisions and instead give your investments time to grow steadily and accumulate.When it comes to identifying good investors, there are several key traits to look for. A good investor is someone who possesses a futuristic mindset, plans meticulously, manages finances effectively, mitigates risks wisely, and has a clear vision of their goals. These qualities enable them to see opportunities instead of challenges and work towards a prosperous future.While Bitcoin presents a lucrative investment opportunity, it's important to acknowledge the inherent risks involved. Understanding these risks and learning how to navigate them is crucial for any investor. By staying informed and making informed decisions, we can harness the potential of Bitcoin as an asset and build a successful investment portfolio.

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: I am not getting what you want to express exactly. A Bitcoin investor should be well-experienced and well Patience. Otherwise, they won't become a Bitcoin investor at all. I am talking about personal investment actually, not institutional investors. Because institutional investors are well-planned and won't regret their actions. Please write well instead of botted your thread. So we can realize what you want to explain.

comments.author: Hatchy
comments.body: What makes a good investor, is simple the ability to understand the risk and plan very well before making any move. Having patience also can make one a good investor as investment take time to yield good result. If one is not patient, he ends up investment in the wrong time and making rash decision that can complicate his  investment .As some good strategist has said before now, always learn to diversify portfolio and avoid placing all eggs in one basket. As this is another way to be a good investor. Learn new strategies, follow new trends, always be informed about latest Change in the market and overall, take you time to plan. Don't be in a hurry.(fomo) and with  these you  can become a good investor.

comments.author: SatoPrincess
comments.body: I don’t know the purpose that this thread serves, maybe this your own idea of what a bitcoin investor should be. IMO the most important thing when investing in bitcoin is understanding the tech and being patient with your investments. Bitcoin is not a get rich quick scheme, it takes times for investors to see x2 of their investment, not many can be disciplined to hodl for that long, that’s why it’s recommended to invest only what you can afford to lose.

comments.author: Texac
comments.body: Ignore those and evaluate the results they achieve, you will know if it is a good or bad investor.  many investors have a good plan and calculate everything perfectly…but if the results are not as expected or not profitable, they are not good investors.  I believe that each person has a personality, a mindset, and the way to success is never the same. so, don't be too rigid with the propagated theories, but find the best method for yourself.

Bitcoin investors don't have two hearts or brains but are humans like other investors. You have rightly outlined some of the characteristics of a good business person and I think planning, risk management, and financial management are important. comments.author: hyudien
comments.body: Quote from: MTNNET on May 14, 2023, 07:33:55 PMThat's how to know a good investors of bitcoin who do not see challenges but the possibilities of making their future work.Bitcoin is a good assets to invest on but it's also has it own risk which you must learn.Actually, being a good Bitcoin investor is not always complicated, as long as you only need to believe in the value of Bitcoin, know how long to hold it. And more importantly he has cold funds to keep accumulating his money into Bitcoin. Even in the midst of many FUD doubts about Bitcoin a good investor will not care about FUD, he understands in great detail every risk taken and is willing to bet with himself. Everyone knows the risks but not everyone manages to survive them. If you want to become a Bitcoin investor, the first thing to do is put aside negative and optimistic news according to your initial goals.

comments.author: dzungmobile
comments.body: Quote from: KingsDen on May 14, 2023, 11:56:24 PMA good bitcoin investor is one who buys low and sell highIt is true in a wide view but it is not true in short view.If you are a very experienced investor, you can still make mistake by buying at too high price, but if with your experience and technical knowledge, you can know when the market starts to be dumped. At that time, you can sell your bitcoin which was bought at high price and wait for lower discount price to buy back.It is not means you are trading if you only do it with very big trend change. You are still a good investor if you buy high, sell low, and buy back lower then hodl it.

comments.author: Litzki1990
comments.body: After investing some bad times may come in the market if we can't be patient at that time then there is no point in investing. If you invest at the right time, the chances of making a profit are higher than the loss. As you said investing requires risk planning patience market observation all these things.  If we don't have a risk appetite we can't invest If we don't have a plan We can't invest at the right time Due to lack of proper planning If we don't have patience then we won't be able to hold on to our investment when the value of the coin goes down after investing. To be an ideal investor we must have these qualities or we will never succeed in investing.
